Key Match Events: Taskin Ahmed dismissed Vikramjit Singh and Bas de Leede off consecutive deliveries in the first two balls of the Dutch team's run-chase.
Hasan Mahmud got the wickets of Tim Pringle and Logan van Beek and bowled at an economy rate of 3.75.
Mustafizur Rahman finished with figures of 4-0-20-3.
Pre-Game Insights: Taskin Ahmed hoped to take a hat-trick in Bangladesh's T20 World Cup 2022 Super 12 match against the Netherlands.
Post-Match Reflections: Taskin Ahmed mentioned that hitting the hard lengths on a consistent basis helped the Bangladesh fast bowlers to a large extent.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Taskin Ahmed became the Player of the Match after the Tigers secured a crucial nine-wicket victory in the multi-nation mega event.
